attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My name is Ibrahim Tijani and my DOB is 7.1.1985. I am 25 yrs old and I came to England when i was 11 went to school , college and university in england.I have previously tired to apply for british neutralisation to become a british and have a british passport but my apllication was rejected as i had a court case for driving offences and I was given community services by the court and was also fined. I have served my community service and paid my court fine, yet the government still refuses to neutralise me . My mother, father , 2 brothers and 2 sisters all have british passports.I just feel i have been treated unfair as i work in this country and i pay tax i hyave served my punishement for my driving offences.The country can tax me , give me a UK drivers licence but do not want me to have a british neutralisation?I have been in the UK for 14 years and grew up here its all i know. We are all human beings we all make mistakes. Please can you help me get my british neutralisation as quickly as possible.Because i had driving offences does this not make me british ? PLEASE HELP ME I AM STUCK, I HAVE A SON IN THIS COUNTRY AS WELL.

rejection.details: We cannot accept an e-petition relating to an individual case-  this is a matter for direct communications with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
